rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Garage Access
rooms.description: Serves as the entry point into the property, leading to the two-car garage. The design includes a spacious foyer that adheres to Vastu guidelines by aligning the entrance with the North-East direction for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Living Area
rooms.description: Centrally located living space designed in Mediterranean style, featuring vaulted ceilings and terracotta tile flooring. The room is arranged to promote social interaction while respecting Vastu by ensuring open spaces.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with Mediterranean elements. It includes an island counter, energy-efficient appliances and a dedicated prep area that respects the South-East direction for wealth and abundance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom positioned on the North side to promote health and well-being. The room includes an ensuite bathroom, with windows aligned according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed for comfort, located to the South-West to support relaxation and balance in energy flow.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Private living space for household staff. Positioned near the service entrance and kitchen area, ensuring easy access while respecting privacy and Vastu guidelines for domestic harmony.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.details: Large double door facilitating smooth entry with a welcoming aesthetic in line with Mediterranean design.

openings.name: Garage Door
openings.details: Two-car garage door integrated into the ground floor facade for convenient access to vehicles.

openings.name: Courtyard Access
openings.details: An open courtyard that connects living spaces and provides natural light, ventilation, and a communal area following Vastu principles of balance and energy flow.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom / Study
rooms.description: Flex space that can be converted to a home office or additional bedroom. Designed with Mediterranean details, it features built-in storage and abundant natural light from strategically placed windows.

rooms.name: Balcony / Terrace
rooms.description: A small balcony offering views of the central courtyard, designed to enhance relaxation and ensure energy flow as per Vastu.

openings.name: Interior Staircase
openings.details: Sturdy staircase connecting ground floor and first floor, designed with safety, accessibility, and aesthetic considerations in mind.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.details: Optimized window placements to maximize natural light while respecting Vastu guidelines for balanced energy distribution.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom located on the second floor, designed with Mediterranean charm and functional amenities, ensuring privacy and ease of access.

rooms.name: Utility/Service Area
rooms.description: Small utility room for storage and maintenance activities, conveniently placed near the servant's quarters.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.details: Windows arranged to enhance cross ventilation and natural lighting in line with both Mediterranean design aesthetics and Vastu principles.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.details: Provides access to the central courtyard, reinforcing the connection between different living spaces while following energy flow guidelines.
